text: (he nabee!)[1] unase kahoh kya tumane dekha hai apane saajhiyon ko, jinhen tum pukaarate ho allaah ke atirikt? mujhe bhee dikhao ki unhonne kitana bhaag banaaya hai dharatee mein se? ya unaka aakaashon mein kuchh saajha hai? ya hamane pradaan kee hai unhen koee pustak, to ye usake khule pramaanon par hain? balki (baat ye hai ki) atyaachaaree ek-doosare ko keval dhokhe ka vachan de rahe hain
